about_the_game:
WRECK is a fast-paced shooter with a fully destructible environment. Demolish entire maps and create your own with the free level editor. Take down an oppressive regime in the singleplayer campaign, or fight against your friends in multiplayer.

The WRECK Early Demo is a limited sample of WRECK's engine features, including fully destructible environments. I will use the results of the demo to determine what to change for the full game, and optimize the code of the engine to run faster on older hardware.
